title: Tropical Bahamas Oceanfront Suite Escape with Three Onsite Restaurants & Spa
description:
Experience the untouched beauty of the Bahamas at the luxurious and serene sanctuary set on the white sands of South Andros Island. This boutique resort, surrounded by spectacular turquoise waters, offers a unique blend of modern luxury and tropical charm.

Indulge in local flavours at the onsite Driffs Beach Bar or Lusca, offering an ever-changing menu of Caribbean flavours. Explore the island's underwater world with a snorkelling adventure, take a leisurely bike ride or unwind at the onsite spa. This resort, a hidden gem, is the perfect base for a tranquil island escape.
offer_address: Queen's Highway, Driggs Hill Settlement, South Andros, Bahamas
